caption: Detection Finding
description: A Detection Finding describes detections or alerts generated by security products using correlation engines or other methodologies.
name: detection

status.description: The normalized status of a Detection Finding set by the consumer normalized to the caption of the status_id value. In the case of 'Other', it is defined by the source.

status_id.description: The normalized status identifier of a Detection Finding, set by the consumer.

1.caption: New
1.description: The Detection Finding is new and yet to be reviewed.

2.caption: In Progress
2.description: The Detection Finding is under review.

3.caption: Suppressed
3.description: The Detection Finding was reviewed, considered as a false positive and is now suppressed.

4.caption: Resolved
4.description: The Detection Finding was reviewed and remediated and is now considered resolved.

vulnerabilities.description: Describes vulnerabilities reported in a Detection Finding.
